metadata.description: Expansion rules - House lords, Aspects, D9 Navamsa, D10 Dasamsa

rules.condition: IF 3rd house lord is placed in 7th house
rules.effect: THEN native's siblings play important role in marriage. Spouse may be introduced through siblings or neighbors. Communication and short travels connected to marriage. Spouse may be from nearby location.
rules.commentary: The 3rd house represents siblings, courage, and communication. When its lord occupies the 7th house of marriage, these themes merge with partnership matters.

rules.condition: IF 4th house lord is placed in 10th house
rules.effect: THEN native gains property and vehicles through career. Mother supports professional life. Success in real estate, agriculture, or automotive industries. Fame through land dealings or construction. Strong connection between home and career.
rules.commentary: Highly favorable placement. The 4th house of home, mother, and property connects with 10th house of career and public status. Native may work from home or in fields related to real estate.

rules.condition: IF 5th house lord is placed in 9th house
rules.effect: THEN powerful Dharma-Karma Adhipati Yoga forms. Native gains through higher education, children, and past merit. Success in teaching, philosophy, or spiritual fields. Children bring good fortune. Strong connection with father or gurus.
rules.commentary: Excellent placement linking houses of dharma (5th and 9th). Native has good intelligence, virtuous children, and benefits from higher learning and spirituality.

rules.condition: IF 6th house lord is placed in 12th house
rules.effect: THEN Viparita Raja Yoga may form. Enemies destroyed, debts cleared, diseases overcome. Success through foreign connections or isolated work. Expenditure on health leads to healing. Victory over obstacles.
rules.commentary: Dusthana lord in dusthana creates Viparita yoga. Negative energies cancel each other. Native overcomes difficulties and gains from foreign lands or spiritual pursuits.

rules.condition: IF 8th house lord is placed in 2nd house
rules.effect: THEN native faces fluctuations in wealth. Income from inheritance, insurance, or occult sciences. Speech may be harsh or secretive. Wealth through research, investigation, or hidden sources. Family secrets may affect finances.
rules.commentary: The 8th house of transformation and hidden matters affects the 2nd house of wealth and speech. Creates complexity in financial matters and family dynamics.

rules.condition: IF 9th house lord is placed in 5th house
rules.effect: THEN powerful Raja Yoga forms. Native blessed with intelligence, good fortune, and virtuous children. Success in education, speculation, and creative fields. Father supports educational pursuits. Strong dharmic values passed to children.
rules.commentary: Excellent trine lord exchange. The 9th lord of fortune and father strengthens the 5th house of intelligence and children. Creates prosperity through righteous actions.

rules.condition: IF 10th house lord is placed in 4th house
rules.effect: THEN native achieves fame through property, education, or vehicles. Career success brings happiness and property. Work from home or in fields related to real estate, teaching, or automotive. Mother influences career choices.
rules.commentary: Career (10th) and home (4th) are connected. Native finds professional success through domestic matters or works in fields related to property, education, or public welfare.

rules.condition: IF 12th house lord is placed in 9th house
rules.effect: THEN native inclined toward foreign travel for spiritual purposes. Expenses on dharmic activities, pilgrimages, and religious practices. Father may live abroad or be spiritual. Gains from foreign lands through righteous means.
rules.commentary: The 12th house of foreign lands and expenses connects with 9th house of dharma and fortune. Creates opportunities for spiritual growth through foreign connections.

rules.condition: IF 5th house lord is placed in 11th house
rules.effect: THEN native gains wealth through speculation, investments, and creative pursuits. Children bring financial gains. Success in stock market, gambling, or entertainment. Fulfillment of desires through intelligence and past merit.
rules.commentary: Highly favorable for wealth. The 5th house of purva punya (past merit) and intelligence strengthens the 11th house of gains and fulfillment of desires.

rules.condition: IF 7th house lord is placed in 3rd house
rules.effect: THEN spouse is courageous and communicative. Marriage through siblings or short travels. Spouse may be younger or from nearby location. Partnership in business involving communication, media, or arts. Requires effort in marriage.
rules.commentary: Marriage (7th) connected with courage and communication (3rd). Spouse has strong personality and may work in fields involving writing, media, or business.

rules.condition: IF Jupiter aspects 2nd house
rules.effect: THEN native blessed with wealth, wisdom in speech, and family prosperity. Good financial management and savings. Speech is pleasing, truthful, and knowledgeable. Family is educated and virtuous. Gains from teaching or advisory roles.
rules.commentary: Jupiter's beneficial aspect on the house of wealth and speech brings prosperity, good values, and pleasant communication. Native accumulates wealth through righteous means.

rules.condition: IF Jupiter aspects 5th house
rules.effect: THEN native blessed with intelligent and virtuous children. Excellence in education, creativity, and speculation. Strong moral values and dharmic inclinations. Success in teaching, counseling, or spiritual practices. Good fortune through past merit.
rules.commentary: Highly auspicious. Jupiter's benefic influence on the 5th house enhances intelligence, children's welfare, and creative abilities. Native has strong purva punya (past merit).

rules.condition: IF Jupiter aspects 9th house
rules.effect: THEN native highly spiritual, religious, and fortunate. Strong connection with father and gurus. Success in higher education, philosophy, and dharmic pursuits. Foreign travels for spiritual purposes. Natural teacher and guide for others.
rules.commentary: Most auspicious aspect. Jupiter strengthens the 9th house of dharma, fortune, and father. Native is blessed with good fortune, wisdom, and spiritual inclinations.

rules.condition: IF Saturn aspects 10th house
rules.effect: THEN native achieves career success through hard work, discipline, and perseverance. Slow but steady professional growth. Authority in administration, law, or labor-intensive fields. Delays in career recognition but ultimate success through patience.
rules.commentary: Saturn's aspect brings discipline and structure to career. Native must work hard but eventually achieves lasting success and authority. Best for government, administration, or traditional professions.

rules.condition: IF Saturn aspects 6th house
rules.effect: THEN native overcomes enemies and diseases through patience and persistence. Strong immunity developed over time. Success in service sector or healthcare. Ability to handle chronic conditions through discipline. Victory over obstacles through systematic approach.
rules.commentary: Saturn's aspect on the dusthana (6th house) is favorable. Native develops strength to overcome enemies, debts, and diseases through disciplined approach.

rules.condition: IF Mars aspects 10th house
rules.effect: THEN native achieves career success through courage, action, and technical skills. Leadership in military, engineering, surgery, or sports. Dynamic professional approach with competitive spirit. Rise through valor and decisive action.
rules.commentary: Mars energizes the 10th house of career with courage and action. Native excels in fields requiring physical strength, technical skills, or competitive spirit.

rules.condition: IF Mars aspects 7th house
rules.effect: THEN native may experience conflicts in marriage but spouse is courageous and independent. Requires patience in partnership. Spouse may work in technical, military, or competitive fields. Physical attraction strong but temperament clashes possible.
rules.commentary: Mars's fiery nature can create challenges in marriage but also brings passion and energy. Spouse is strong-willed and independent. Need for mutual respect and space.

rules.condition: IF Venus aspects 2nd house
rules.effect: THEN native enjoys wealth, luxury items, and sweet speech. Family life is harmonious and prosperous. Gains through arts, beauty products, or luxury goods. Speech is pleasing, diplomatic, and refined. Good financial management through aesthetic ventures.
rules.commentary: Venus's benefic aspect on the 2nd house brings material comforts, pleasant speech, and family harmony. Native accumulates wealth through creative or aesthetic pursuits.

rules.condition: IF Venus is exalted in D9 (Navamsa) chart
rules.effect: THEN native experiences ultimate happiness in marriage. Spouse is loving, beautiful, and brings good fortune. Strong physical and emotional compatibility. Marriage partnership is source of joy and material comfort. Artistic and harmonious married life.
rules.commentary: Navamsa is the chart of marriage and dharma. Exalted Venus in D9 is highly auspicious for marital happiness, indicating a spouse of high quality and a harmonious partnership.

rules.condition: IF 7th lord of D1 is strong in D9 Navamsa
rules.effect: THEN native has happy and stable marriage. Spouse is supportive, compatible, and brings prosperity. Marriage promises from birth chart are fulfilled. Good marital harmony and longevity of partnership. Spouse's qualities manifest fully.
rules.commentary: The strength of 7th lord in D9 confirms and amplifies marriage promises. Strong placement in Navamsa ensures manifestation of positive marital indications.

rules.condition: IF multiple planets exalted or in own signs in D9
rules.effect: THEN native has strong dharmic foundation and spiritual inclinations. Good karma from past lives manifests. Protected by divine grace. Success in dharmic pursuits and spiritual practices. Life unfolds with purpose and meaning.
rules.commentary: Navamsa reveals the fruit of past karmas and soul's journey. Multiple strong planets indicate accumulated good karma and spiritual strength.

rules.condition: IF Mars is placed in 1st, 4th, 7th, 8th, or 12th house in D9
rules.effect: THEN Navamsa Mangal Dosha is present. Spouse may be aggressive, independent, or strong-willed. Potential for marital conflicts or delays. Remedies recommended through matching with similar Mars placement or spiritual practices. Second marriage may be indicated.
rules.commentary: Mars in certain houses of D9 creates challenges in marriage. However, if both partners have similar placement, it cancels. Navamsa Mars dosha is considered more significant than Rashi chart Mars dosha.

rules.condition: IF Jupiter aspects 7th house in D9 Navamsa
rules.effect: THEN marriage is blessed and prosperous. Spouse is wise, virtuous, and brings good fortune. Marital harmony through mutual respect and dharmic values. Children from marriage are blessed. In-laws supportive and beneficial.
rules.translation: Jupiter's aspect on seventh in Navamsa
rules.commentary: Jupiter's benefic aspect in the marriage chart (D9) is highly auspicious. It protects marriage from difficulties and ensures lasting happiness through shared values.

rules.condition: IF Ascendant lord of D1 is placed in trine or angle in D9
rules.effect: THEN native's overall life promises are fulfilled. Strength to overcome obstacles and achieve goals. Dharmic path clear and supported. Life unfolds according to soul's purpose. Protection from major difficulties through divine grace.
rules.translation: Lagna lord in angle or trine in Navamsa
rules.commentary: The placement of birth ascendant lord in D9 shows whether life promises will manifest. Strong placement in D9 confirms fulfillment of birth chart indications.

rules.condition: IF 10th lord of D1 is exalted in D10 (Dasamsa) chart
rules.effect: THEN native achieves peak professional success and fame. Career potential fully manifested. Leadership position in chosen field. Recognition and awards for professional excellence. Strong reputation and lasting legacy through work.
rules.commentary: D10 is the specific divisional chart for career analysis. Exalted 10th lord in D10 indicates the highest level of professional achievement possible in one's field.

rules.condition: IF Sun is strong and well-placed in D10
rules.effect: THEN native gains authority, government positions, or leadership roles. Career in administration, politics, or public service. Recognition from government or high authorities. Strong executive abilities and administrative skills.
rules.commentary: Sun represents authority and government in career matters. Strong Sun in D10 indicates success in positions of power and leadership in public sector.

rules.condition: IF Mercury is strong in D10
rules.effect: THEN native excels in business, communication, or analytical fields. Success in commerce, media, technology, or education. Strong intellectual capabilities in professional sphere. Adaptability and versatility in career choices.
rules.commentary: Mercury governs business, communication, and intellect. Strong Mercury in career chart indicates success in fields requiring analytical abilities and communication skills.

rules.condition: IF Jupiter is placed in 10th house of D10
rules.effect: THEN native becomes respected teacher, advisor, or consultant. Success in education, counseling, law, or finance. Career brings wisdom and guides others. Professional reputation based on knowledge and ethical conduct. Advisory roles to powerful people.
rules.translation: Jupiter in tenth house of Dasamsa
rules.commentary: Jupiter in the 10th house of career chart is highly auspicious. Native becomes a guide and teacher through their profession, gaining respect for wisdom and ethical conduct.

rules.condition: IF Mars is strong in D10
rules.effect: THEN native succeeds in technical, military, or engineering fields. Career involving physical action, competition, or machinery. Success through courage, quick decisions, and technical expertise. Leadership in action-oriented professions like surgery, sports, or defense.
rules.commentary: Mars represents technical skills, courage, and action. Strong Mars in D10 indicates success in careers requiring physical energy, technical knowledge, or competitive spirit.

rules.condition: IF Venus is placed in 10th house of D10
rules.effect: THEN native achieves success in arts, entertainment, luxury goods, or beauty industry. Career brings fame through creative expression. Success in fashion, cinema, music, or hospitality. Professional life characterized by aesthetics, comfort, and artistic excellence.
rules.translation: Venus in tenth house of Dasamsa
rules.commentary: Venus in career chart's 10th house indicates success in creative and aesthetic fields. Native gains recognition through artistic talents or work in luxury/beauty industries.
